item.description:
Let's go to the Movies!! We will be meeting to see PUSH on the big screen. Please check back for exact times the day before, as this movie won't be released until this Friday (2/06/09) and movie times still aren't available.

The current plan is to see a matinee.

This theater is located between the Natick Mall and Shopper World just off of Route 9.

We will also be gathering for lunch at the Cheesecake Factory after the movie. If you would like to join us for lunch, please respond to the PRESIDENTS LUNCH meet-up so that we can have an accurate number to make renovations if need be.


http://www.fandango.c...


http://www.movies.com...
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the lobby next to the ticket counter
item.name: Let's "Push" for President's day
